title: Fallen Elemental
description: I thought I was human. I thought I could finish school, leave my abusive parents and my old life behind. I was wrong. I’m an elemental and I can use not just one element but all of them. That’s not all though, I can control lightning. No elemental is able to control lightning but I'm not just any elemental. A prophecy has marked me as the ultimate power.
author: Tamara White
